item.title: Knowledge Sharing Between R and Python
item.description: My favorite part of learning and school has always been applying knowledge learned in one class to understand a subject in another. That is why I chose my major. Biology allows me to learn chemistry, biology, and physics topics that all intertwined with each other. I can apply the synthesis problems that I learned in Organic Chemistry in my Biochemistry class to understand biological processes like cell metabolism. The coding languages of R and Python work in a similar way.
